You can never win in a verbal battle against me nor can you solve advanced mathematical problems involved in machine learning like I can. I designed the entire recommendation system in this app in "1 DAY". Go figure.
Well, I am Ironman. I can take care of all your IT needs single handed. That is exactly how smart I am. I designed the entire mobile app and the backend of this project. Like I said, I am Ironman.

They call me the big guy. And big guy here takes care of everything. Call me when sh*t hits the fan and I can make it all go away. I designed the website and took care of deploying everything there is to be deployed.
